channel.title: [317] Noob Revolution
channel.description:
Hello. This is my latest project. The base will be ExRendum. Reason for the base:
This base is very stable for delta. I can run it on my computer with no lag[512mb of ram]. The base is loaded with features that need improvement.
Logs ___________________________________________________________________________ Bounty hunter: Bugs/Glitches: When you go in, and another person goes in, it doesn't identify the person as your target. ___________________________________________________________________________ Commands: When you enter a command, a syntax error in the ban command shows. ___________________________________________________________________________ Combat: None, but I'm adding combat following ___________________________________________________________________________ Pictures: None at the moment. Videos: None at the moment

item.title: [317] Noob Revolution
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Rich:

You will need to add pictures and more information to the thread asap, as right now it’s not really looking all that much of a development.

Sorry, I’ve been inactive removing a virus.

@Tomscape, I’m not hosting this server.

Woot woot. Replaced my hard-drive, pics coming soon.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Noob Revolution
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Hello. This is my latest project.

The base will be ExRendum.

Reason for the base:

This base is very stable for delta. I can run it on my computer with no lag[512mb of ram]. The base is loaded with features that need improvement.

Logs

Bounty hunter:

Bugs/Glitches:
When you go in, and another person goes in, it doesn’t identify the person as your target.

Commands:
When you enter a command, a syntax error in the ban command shows.

Combat:
None, but I’m adding combat following

Pictures:
None at the moment.

Videos:
None at the moment
